## BotBuilderCloudAdapter.NotificationOptions.botAppId property

An optional input of bot app Id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
botAppId?: string;
```

## Remarks

If `botAppId` is not provided, `process.env.BOT_ID` will be used by default.
